I said a Prayer for You Today Holiday Card

Hot Review! I said a Prayer for You Today Holiday Card – Get Well Cards I said a Prayer for You Today Holiday Card quality over price I said a Prayer for You Today Holiday Card Try to read more firstEncourage someone to by letting them know you are praying for them with this elegant typography design featuring the message: "A Prayer for you. I said a PRAYER for you today. I prayed that God would lift you up in His hand, comfort you with His Love, wipe every tear from your eye, and strengthen you to face the day. I prayed that God would remind you that you’re never alone, and you’re LOVED more than you can imagine ‚Äì by Him, by me." Design is accented with beautiful, floral illustration on right side with watercolor digital paper background. Inside has comforting words but can be customized with your own personal message.
Be encouraged, knowing I’m praying for you, I’m here for you, and I care. Price:$2.56
